opendial.bn.distribs.continuous

Class ContinuousDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.bn.distribs.continuous.ContinuousDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndependentProbDistribution, ProbDistribution

    public class ContinuousDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements IndependentProbDistribution
    Representation of a continuous probability distribution, defined by an arbitrary density function over a single (univariate or multivariate) variable. The distribution does not take any conditional assignment.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-20 21:16:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
